text: The Empire of Magadha refers to the successive imperial dynasties that ruled over the throne of Magadha in ancient India. Bimbisara is considered to be the founder of the empire. The empire was ruled by the Haryanka, Shaishunga, Nanda, Maurya, Shunga and Kanva dynasties. == References == Category:Ancient India Category:History of India Category:5th century BC Category:4th century BC
title: Empire of Magadha
